page.description: Converts a CrLf delimited list to a comma delimited list.

argument.name: CR-LF_List
argument.description: A list of items, each separated by CR-LF codes.

argument.name: Source
argument.description: A list of items, each separated by a comma.

page.discussion: The COMMA_TO_CRLF() function converts a CR-LF delimited list to a comma delimited list.
page.example: dim list as C list = <<%str% aaron bob charles david %str% ? list = aaron bob charles david ? crlf_to_comma(list) = "aaron,bob,charles,david"
